TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TraceSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class TraceSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 ASP.NET 跟踪服务。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET trace service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的内容`trace`部分。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the configuration file `trace` section. 跟踪部分配置的 ASP.NET 跟踪功能和控制如何收集、 存储并显示跟踪结果。The trace section configures the ASP.NET trace functionality and controls how trace results are gathered, stored, and displayed. 启用跟踪后，每个页请求生成可以追加到页面输出或存储在应用程序跟踪日志的跟踪消息。When tracing is enabled, each page request generates trace messages that can be appended to the page output or stored in an application trace log. ASP.NET 跟踪查看器 (Trace.axd) 可用于查看跟踪日志的内容。You can use the ASP.NET trace viewer (Trace.axd) to view the contents of the trace log. > [!NOTE] > Machine.config 文件和 Web.config 文件中的配置层次结构的部分中允许使用元素。The element is allowed in the section of the configuration hierarchy in the Machine.config file and the Web.config files. 不允许在配置文件的 Web 子目录中。It is not allowed in configuration files of Web subdirectories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类型。The following code example shows how to use the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/CS/tracesection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/VB/tracesection.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET trace service is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用跟踪，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if trace is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 跟踪查看器 (Trace.axd) 是否只用于来自主机 Web 服务器的请求。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET trace viewer (Trace.axd) is available only to requests from the host Web server.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 跟踪查看器 (Trace.axd) 只用于来自主机 Web 服务器的请求，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the ASP.NET trace viewer (Trace.axd) is available only to requests from the host Web server; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MostRecent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否总是将最近的请求存储在服务器中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the most recent requests are always stored on the server.

value.span: 如果总是将最近的请求存储在跟踪日志中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the most recent requests are always stored in the trace log; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求存储在它们到达时，最多的请求中指定数的顺序中的跟踪日志属性。Requests are stored in the trace log in the order they arrive, up to the number of requests specified in the property. 当达到了请求限制和是`true`，自动放弃以前的请求，并且新请求继续添加到日志。When the request limit is reached and is `true`, older requests are automatically discarded and new requests continue to be added to the log. 当达到了请求限制和是`false`，直到从日志移除以前的请求或请求限制已增加，新请求将被丢弃。When the request limit is reached and is `false`, new requests are discarded until earlier requests are removed from the log or the request limit is increased. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/CS/tracesection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/VB/tracesection.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将 ASP.NET 跟踪信息追加到每页的输出中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET trace information is appended to the output of each page.

value.span: 如果将跟踪信息追加到每页中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the trace information is appended to each page; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property int RequestLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对 ASP.NET 为其存储跟踪信息的应用程序的最大请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of requests to the application for which ASP.NET stores trace information.

value.span: 存储在服务器上的最大请求数。

span.span: The maximum number of requests to store on the server.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最大请求限制为 10000。The maximum request limit is 10,000. 如果指定一个值大于 10000，它是以无提示方式向下舍入到 10000 ASP.NET。If a value greater than 10,000 is specified, it is silently rounded down to 10,000 by ASP.NET. 属性获取或设置一个值，确定是否在服务器上存储的请求的最新的请求或要到达的第一个请求。The property gets or sets a value that determines whether the requests stored on the server are the most recent requests or the first requests to arrive. **请注意**的请求数超过此设置指定的限制时和是`false`，存储在跟踪日志中没有更多的请求。**Note** When the number of requests exceeds the limit imposed by this setting and is `false`, no more requests are stored in the trace log. 如果是`true`、 最近的请求存储到此设置指定的限制和较旧的请求将被丢弃。If is `true`, the most recent requests are stored up to the limit imposed by this setting and older requests are discarded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置 ASP.NET 跟踪信息的显示顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the order in which ASP.NET trace information is displayed.

value.span: 值之一，该值指示跟踪信息的显示顺序。

span.span: One of the values, indicating the order in which trace information is displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否把页面跟踪发出的消息转发给 类的实例。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the messages emitted through the page trace are forwarded to an instance of the class.

value.span: 如果将跟踪消息发送到 类，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the trace messages are sent to the class; otherwise, .
The default is .
